actionCalls.description: Action to generate default naming convention for the address record in order not to have a too long address name in case of long street or city names.
actionCalls.name: Apex_GenerateDefaultNamingConventionForAddressRecord
actionCalls.label: Generate Default Naming Convention For Address Record

actionCalls.description: Action to generate unique key in order to check if the address is already stored in the database.

assignments.description: Primary always marked as true for the new account address, and type = 'EEN' + Country = 'NL'
assignments.name: Assignment_Of_Standard_Values_For_New_Account_Address
assignments.label: Assignment Of Standard Values For New Account Address

assignments.label: VarT_FlowElement - Apex_GenerateDefaultNamingConventionForAddressRecord

decisions.description: Decision to determine if a new account address should be created or a selected needs to be changed
decisions.name: Change_Account_Address_Or_Create_New_Account_Address
decisions.label: Change Account Address Or Create New Account Address

decisions.description: Decision to check if account is newly created from previous New Account Screen Flow and - if not - to validate if the existing account already has account addresses. We will use this flow for contract unit address changes later too, therefore the other outcome for contract unit flow later. The 'No' specifies that an existing account doesn't have an address yet.
decisions.name: Determine_Flow_Path_Based_On_Input_Variables_Values
decisions.label: Determine Flow Path Based On Input Variables/Values
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: Existing Account/Contract, but Address(es) Not Known

rules.name: Existing_Account_And_Account_Addresses_Are_Known
rules.label: Existing Account & Account Addresses Are Known

decisions.description: Determine if the account in this flow needs to be created first to create the account address afterwards. An update on existing account is not possible to reduce double callouts to Okapi...
decisions.name: Is_Account_Newly_Created
decisions.label: Is Account Newly Created?

rules.name: Yes_Unique_Key_is_already_known
rules.label: Yes, Unique Key is already known

decisions.description: Decision to determine which kind of address information needs to be collected for the Dutch or foreign country address or postal box/freepostalnumber address
decisions.name: Which_Kind_Of_Address_To_Create
decisions.label: Which Kind Of Address To Create

formulas.name: forT_Current_BillingAddress
formulas.expression: IF( AND( ISBLANK({!varR_Account.BillingPostalCode}), ISBLANK({!varR_Account.BillingCity}) ), {!$Label.Unknown}, {!varR_Account.BillingStreet} + BR() + {!varR_Account.BillingPostalCode} + ", " + {!varR_Account.BillingCity} + BR() + IF( ISBLANK({!varR_Account.BillingState}), "", {!varR_Account.BillingState} + BR() ) + {!varR_Account.BillingCountry} )

formulas.name: forT_Current_ShippingAddress
formulas.expression: IF( AND( ISBLANK({!varR_Account.ShippingPostalCode}), ISBLANK({!varR_Account.ShippingCity}) ), {!$Label.Unknown}, {!varR_Account.ShippingStreet} + BR() + {!varR_Account.ShippingPostalCode} + ", " + {!varR_Account.ShippingCity} + BR() + IF( ISBLANK({!varR_Account.ShippingState}), "", {!varR_Account.ShippingState} + BR() ) + {!varR_Account.ShippingCountry} )

recordCreates.description: Create Account record based on entered values in New Business Account or New Person Account flow
recordCreates.name: Create_Account
recordCreates.label: Account

recordLookups.description: Retrieve the record with the same unique corresponding key
recordLookups.name: Get_AddressesLine
recordLookups.label: Addresses Line

recordRollbacks.description: If the Flow Errors we don't want to stop half way in the process. The whole process should roll back and run again.
recordRollbacks.name: RollBackRecords
recordRollbacks.label: Roll Back Records

recordUpdates.description: Update the selected account address based on changed values in screen before.
recordUpdates.name: Update_AccountAddress
recordUpdates.label: Account Address

screens.name: Add_New_Account_Address

{!forT_Current_ShippingAddress}

Current Billing Address:

fields.name: Address_Line_2_foreign
fields.fieldText: Address Line 2
fields.helpText: To register the precise location of the recipients apartment, unit, room, or floor number.

fields.name: City_foreign

validationRule.errorMessage: Plaatsnaam kan niet langer zijn dan 50 karakters.

fields.name: Start_Date_foreign
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.StartDate}

screens.description: Unless an impossible decision outcome based on the exclusion in the criteria entry and required status in the datatable, a screen to show that the process will stop
screens.name: Screen_Excluded_Decision_Outcome
screens.label: Screen Excluded Decision Outcome

fields.name: Txt_StoppingFlow
fields.fieldText: This outcome cannot occur in a normal process. This means that selecting one of the addresses or the wish to create a new address did not succeed in the previous screen. Go back and try again.
